1: וְאָ֣הַבְתָּ֔ <sup>157 </sup> <n>Therefore thou shalt love</n> אֵ֖ת <sup>853 </sup> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> וְשָׁמַרְתָּ֣ <sup>8104 </sup> <n>and keep</n> מִשְׁמַרְתּ֗וֹ <sup>4931 </sup> <n>his charge</n> וְחֻקֹּתָ֧יו <sup>2708 </sup> <n>and his statutes</n> וּמִשְׁפָּטָ֛יו <sup>4941 </sup> <n>and his judgments</n> וּמִצְוֹתָ֖יו <sup>4687 </sup> <n>and his commandments</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all manner</n> הַיָּמִֽים׃ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>alway</n>
2: וִֽידַעְתֶּם֮ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>And know</n> הַיּוֹם֒ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>ye this day</n> כִּ֣י ׀ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> בְּנֵיכֶ֗ם <sup>1121 </sup> <n>for [I speak] not with your children</n> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>have not</n> יָדְעוּ֙ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>which have not known</n> וַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>and who</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>have not</n> רָא֔וּ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>and which have not seen</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> מוּסַ֖ר <sup>4148 </sup> <n>the chastisement</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <sup>430 </sup> <n>your God</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> גָּדְל֕וֹ <sup>1433 </sup> <n>his greatness</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יָדוֹ֙ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>hand</n> הַחֲזָקָ֔ה <sup>2389 </sup> <n>his mighty</n> וּזְרֹע֖וֹ <sup>2220 </sup> <n>arm</n> הַנְּטוּיָֽה׃ <sup>5186 </sup> <n>and his stretched out</n>
3: וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֹֽתֹתָיו֙ <sup>226 </sup> <n>And his miracles</n> וְאֶֽת־ <sup>853 </sup> מַעֲשָׂ֔יו <sup>4639 </sup> <n>and his acts</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> עָשָׂ֖ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>which he did</n> בְּת֣וֹךְ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>in the midst</n> מִצְרָ֑יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>of Egypt</n> לְפַרְעֹ֥ה <sup>6547 </sup> <n>unto Pharaoh</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>the king</n> מִצְרַ֖יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>of Egypt</n> וּלְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אַרְצֽוֹ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>and unto all his land</n>
4: וַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>and what</n> עָשָׂה֩ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>And what he did</n> לְחֵ֨יל <sup>2428 </sup> <n>unto the army</n> מִצְרַ֜יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>of Egypt</n> לְסוּסָ֣יו <sup>5483 </sup> <n>unto their horses</n> וּלְרִכְבּ֗וֹ <sup>7393 </sup> <n>and to their chariots</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>when</n> הֵצִ֜יף <sup>6687 </sup> <n>to overflow</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> מֵ֤י <sup>4325 </sup> <n>how he made the water</n> יַם־ <sup>3220 </sup> <n>sea</n> סוּף֙ <sup>5488 </sup> <n>of the Red</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> פְּנֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>6440 </sup> <n>them</n> בְּרָדְפָ֖ם <sup>7291 </sup> <n>as they pursued</n> אַחֲרֵיכֶ֑ם <sup>310 </sup> <n>after</n> וַיְאַבְּדֵ֣ם <sup>6 </sup> <n>hath destroyed</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>you and [how] the LORD</n> עַ֖ד <sup>5704 </sup> <n>this</n> הַיּ֥וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>them unto this day</n> הַזֶּֽה׃ <sup>2088 </sup> <n>he</n>
5: וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>and what</n> עָשָׂ֛ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>And what he did</n> לָכֶ֖ם בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <sup>4057 </sup> <n>unto you in the wilderness</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> בֹּאֲכֶ֖ם <sup>935 </sup> <n>until ye came</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> הַמָּק֥וֹם <sup>4725 </sup> <n>into this place</n> הַזֶּֽה׃ <sup>2088 </sup> <n>to this</n>
6: וַאֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>and what</n> עָשָׂ֜ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>And what he did</n> לְדָתָ֣ן <sup>1885 </sup> <n>unto Dathan</n> וְלַאֲבִירָ֗ם <sup>48 </sup> <n>and Abiram</n> בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the sons</n> אֱלִיאָב֮ <sup>446 </sup> <n>of Eliab</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> רְאוּבֵן֒ <sup>7205 </sup> <n>of Reuben</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>and what</n> פָּצְתָ֤ה <sup>6475 </sup> <n>opened</n> הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <sup>776 </sup> <n>how the earth</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> פִּ֔יהָ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>her mouth</n> וַתִּבְלָעֵ֥ם <sup>1104 </sup> <n>and swallowed them up</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בָּתֵּיהֶ֖ם <sup>1004 </sup> <n>and their households</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אָהֳלֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>168 </sup> <n>and their tents</n> וְאֵ֤ת <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and every</n> הַיְקוּם֙ <sup>3351 </sup> <n>and all the substance</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>and what</n> בְּרַגְלֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>7272 </sup> <n>that [was] in their possession</n> בְּקֶ֖רֶב <sup>7130 </sup> <n>in the midst</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of all Israel</n>
7: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> עֵֽינֵיכֶם֙ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>But your eyes</n> הָֽרֹאֹ֔ת <sup>7200 </sup> <n>have seen</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <sup>4639 </sup> <n>acts</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> הַגָּדֹ֑ל <sup>1419 </sup> <n>all the great</n> אֲשֶׁ֖ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> עָשָֽׂה׃ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>which he did</n>
8: וּשְׁמַרְתֶּם֙ <sup>8104 </sup> <n>Therefore shall ye keep</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>every</n> הַמִּצְוָ֔ה <sup>4687 </sup> <n>all the commandments</n> אֲשֶׁ֛ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> אָנֹכִ֥י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> מְצַוְּךָ֖ <sup>6680 </sup> <n>I command</n> הַיּ֑וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>you this day</n> לְמַ֣עַן <sup>4616 </sup> <n>so</n> תֶּחֶזְק֗וּ <sup>2388 </sup> <n>that ye may be strong</n> וּבָאתֶם֙ <sup>935 </sup> <n>and go in</n> וִֽירִשְׁתֶּ֣ם <sup>3423 </sup> <n>and possess</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָאָ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the land</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> אַתֶּ֛ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> עֹבְרִ֥ים <sup>5674 </sup> <n>whither ye go</n> שָׁ֖מָּה <sup>8033 </sup> <n>in it</n> לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>to possess</n>
9: וּלְמַ֨עַן <sup>4616 </sup> <n>that</n> תַּאֲרִ֤יכוּ <sup>748 </sup> <n>And that ye may prolong</n> יָמִים֙ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>[your] days</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <sup>127 </sup> <n>in the land</n> אֲשֶׁר֩ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> נִשְׁבַּ֨ע <sup>7650 </sup> <n>sware</n> יְהוָ֧ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>which the LORD</n> לַאֲבֹתֵיכֶ֛ם <sup>1 </sup> <n>unto your fathers</n> לָתֵ֥ת <sup>5414 </sup> <n>to give</n> לָהֶ֖ם וּלְזַרְעָ֑ם <sup>2233 </sup> <n>unto them and to their seed</n> אֶ֛רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>a land</n> זָבַ֥ת <sup>2100 </sup> <n>that floweth</n> חָלָ֖ב <sup>2461 </sup> <n>with milk</n> וּדְבָֽשׁ׃ <sup>1706 </sup> <n>and honey</n> ס
10: כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> הָאָ֗רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>For the land</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> אַתָּ֤ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> בָא־ <sup>935 </sup> <n>whither thou goest in</n> שָׁ֙מָּה֙ <sup>8033 </sup> <n>in it</n> לְרִשְׁתָּ֔הּ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>to possess</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>like</n> כְאֶ֤רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>it [is] not as the land</n> מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <sup>4714 </sup> <n>of Egypt</n> הִ֔וא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> יְצָאתֶ֖ם <sup>3318 </sup> <n>from whence ye came out</n> מִשָּׁ֑ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>in it</n> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>where</n> תִּזְרַע֙ <sup>2232 </sup> <n>where thou sowedst</n> אֶֽת־ <sup>853 </sup> זַרְעֲךָ֔ <sup>2233 </sup> <n>thy seed</n> וְהִשְׁקִ֥יתָ <sup>8248 </sup> <n>and wateredst</n> בְרַגְלְךָ֖ <sup>7272 </sup> <n>[it] with thy foot</n> כְּגַ֥ן <sup>1588 </sup> <n>as a garden</n> הַיָּרָֽק׃ <sup>3419 </sup> <n>of herbs</n>
11: וְהָאָ֗רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>But the land</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> אַתֶּ֜ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> עֹבְרִ֥ים <sup>935 </sup> <n>abide</n> שָׁ֙מָּה֙ <sup>8033 </sup> <n>in it</n> לְרִשְׁתָּ֔הּ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>to possess</n> אֶ֥רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>it [is] a land</n> הָרִ֖ים <sup>2022 </sup> <n>of hills</n> וּבְקָעֹ֑ת <sup>1237 </sup> <n>and valleys</n> לִמְטַ֥ר <sup>4306 </sup> <n>of the rain</n> הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>of heaven</n> תִּשְׁתֶּה־ <sup>8354 </sup> <n>[and] drinketh</n> מָּֽיִם׃ <sup>4325 </sup> <n>water</n>
12: אֶ֕רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>A land</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>which the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> דֹּרֵ֣שׁ <sup>1875 </sup> <n>careth for</n> אֹתָ֑הּ <sup>853 </sup> תָּמִ֗יד <sup>8548 </sup> <n>[are] always</n> עֵינֵ֨י <sup>5869 </sup> <n>the eyes</n> יְהוָ֤ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> בָּ֔הּ מֵֽרֵשִׁית֙ <sup>7225 </sup> <n>upon it from the beginning</n> הַשָּׁנָ֔ה <sup>8141 </sup> <n>of the year</n> וְעַ֖ד <sup>5704 </sup> <n>even</n> אַחֲרִ֥ית <sup>319 </sup> <n>even unto the end</n> שָׁנָֽה׃ <sup>8141 </sup> <n>of the year</n> ס
13: וְהָיָ֗ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>shall come</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> שָׁמֹ֤עַ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>And it shall come to pass if ye shall hearken</n> תִּשְׁמְעוּ֙ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>diligently</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> מִצְוֹתַ֔י <sup>4687 </sup> <n>unto my commandments</n> אֲשֶׁ֧ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> אָנֹכִ֛י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> מְצַוֶּ֥ה <sup>6680 </sup> <n>which I command</n> אֶתְכֶ֖ם <sup>853 </sup> הַיּ֑וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>you this day</n> לְאַהֲבָ֞ה <sup>157 </sup> <n>to love</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְהוָ֤ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶם֙ <sup>430 </sup> <n>your God</n> וּלְעָבְד֔וֹ <sup>5647 </sup> <n>and to serve</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> לְבַבְכֶ֖ם <sup>3824 </sup> <n>him with all your heart</n> וּבְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> נַפְשְׁכֶֽם׃ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>and with all your soul</n>
14: וְנָתַתִּ֧י <sup>5414 </sup> <n>That I will give</n> מְטַֽר־ <sup>4306 </sup> <n>[you] the rain</n> אַרְצְכֶ֛ם <sup>776 </sup> <n>of your land</n> בְּעִתּ֖וֹ <sup>6256 </sup> <n>in his due season</n> יוֹרֶ֣ה <sup>3138 </sup> <n>the first rain</n> וּמַלְק֑וֹשׁ <sup>4456 </sup> <n>and the latter rain</n> וְאָסַפְתָּ֣ <sup>622 </sup> <n>that thou mayest gather</n> דְגָנֶ֔ךָ <sup>1715 </sup> <n>in thy corn</n> וְתִֽירֹשְׁךָ֖ <sup>8492 </sup> <n>and thy wine</n> וְיִצְהָרֶֽךָ׃ <sup>3323 </sup> <n>and thine oil</n>
15: וְנָתַתִּ֛י <sup>5414 </sup> <n>And I will send</n> עֵ֥שֶׂב <sup>6212 </sup> <n>grass</n> בְּשָׂדְךָ֖ <sup>7704 </sup> <n>in thy fields</n> לִבְהֶמְתֶּ֑ךָ <sup>929 </sup> <n>for thy cattle</n> וְאָכַלְתָּ֖ <sup>398 </sup> <n>that thou mayest eat</n> וְשָׂבָֽעְתָּ׃ <sup>7646 </sup> <n>and be full</n>
16: הִשָּֽׁמְר֣וּ <sup>8104 </sup> <n>Take heed</n> לָכֶ֔ם פֶּ֥ן <sup>6435 </sup> <n>are not</n> יִפְתֶּ֖ה <sup>6601 </sup> <n>be not deceived</n> לְבַבְכֶ֑ם <sup>3824 </sup> <n>to yourselves that your heart</n> וְסַרְתֶּ֗ם <sup>5493 </sup> <n>and ye turn aside</n> וַעֲבַדְתֶּם֙ <sup>5647 </sup> <n>and serve</n> אֱלֹהִ֣ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>gods</n> אֲחֵרִ֔ים <sup>312 </sup> <n>other</n> וְהִשְׁתַּחֲוִיתֶ֖ם <sup>7812 </sup> <n>and worship</n> לָהֶֽם׃
17: וְחָרָ֨ה <sup>2734 </sup> <n>be kindled</n> אַף־ <sup>639 </sup> <n>wrath</n> יְהוָ֜ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>And [then] the LORD'S</n> בָּכֶ֗ם וְעָצַ֤ר <sup>6113 </sup> <n>against you and he shut up</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <sup>8064 </sup> <n>the heaven</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will be no</n> יִהְיֶ֣ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> מָטָ֔ר <sup>4306 </sup> <n>that there be no rain</n> וְהָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <sup>127 </sup> <n>and that the land</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will be no</n> תִתֵּ֖ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>yield</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְבוּלָ֑הּ <sup>2981 </sup> <n>not her fruit</n> וַאֲבַדְתֶּ֣ם <sup>6 </sup> <n>and [lest] ye perish</n> מְהֵרָ֗ה <sup>4120 </sup> <n>quickly</n> מֵעַל֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> הָאָ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>land</n> הַטֹּבָ֔ה <sup>2896 </sup> <n>from off the good</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>which the LORD</n> נֹתֵ֥ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>giveth</n> לָכֶֽם׃
